body:
I updated the precision in adadelta_test.py so it will be able to test the difference.

So before the bug fix, testing would give the following assertion error:

```
AssertionError:
Not equal to tolerance rtol=0.001, atol=0.001

(mismatch 100.0%)
 x: array([ 0.003901,  0.003901], dtype=float16)
 y: array([ 0.001991,  0.001991], dtype=float16)
```

The original precision `atol=1e-2, rtol=1e-2` for the `accum` variable wasn't able to detect the bug.
